ru.curs.celesta.dbutils

Class GridDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.curs.celesta.dbutils.GridDriver

  • public final class GridDriver
extends Object
    Specifies the record position asynchronously, using separate execution thread.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GridDriver(BasicCursor c) 
      GridDriver(BasicCursor c, Runnable callback) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getApproxTotalCount()
      Returns (approximate) total record count.
      Runnable getChangeNotifier()
      Gets change notifier.
      int getMaxExactScrollValue()
      If the grid is scrolled less than for returned number of records, the exact positioning in cycle will be used instead of interpolation.
      int getTopVisiblePosition()
      Returns scrollbar's knob position for current cursor value.
      boolean isValidFor(BasicCursor c)
      Checks if this driver is valid for a given cursor with its filters and sorting.
      void setChangeNotifier(Runnable changeNotifier)
      Sets change notifier (a method that is being called when grid metrics update is ready).
      void setMaxExactScrollValue(int smallScroll)
      If the grid is scrolled less than for given amount of records, the exact positioning in cycle will be used instead of interpolation.
      void setPosition(BasicCursor c)
      Adjusts internal state for pre-positioned cursor.
      boolean setPosition(int position, BasicCursor c)
      Fills key fields of a cursor based on scroller knob position.

    • Method Detail

      • isValidFor

        public boolean isValidFor(BasicCursor c)
        Checks if this driver is valid for a given cursor with its filters and sorting.
        Parameters:
        c - Cursor for checking.

      • setPosition

        public boolean setPosition(int position,
                           BasicCursor c)
        Fills key fields of a cursor based on scroller knob position.
        Parameters:
        position - scrollbar knob position
        c - Alive cursor to be modified
        Returns:
        false if record set is empty

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(BasicCursor c)
        Adjusts internal state for pre-positioned cursor.
        Parameters:
        c - Cursor that is set to a certain position.

      • getTopVisiblePosition

        public int getTopVisiblePosition()
        Returns scrollbar's knob position for current cursor value.

      • getApproxTotalCount

        public int getApproxTotalCount()
        Returns (approximate) total record count.

        Just after creation of this object this method returns DEFAULT_COUNT value, but it asynchronously requests total count right after constructor execution.

      • setChangeNotifier

        public void setChangeNotifier(Runnable changeNotifier)
        Sets change notifier (a method that is being called when grid metrics update is ready).
        Parameters:
        changeNotifier - new change modifier.

      • getChangeNotifier

        public Runnable getChangeNotifier()
        Gets change notifier.

      • setMaxExactScrollValue

        public void setMaxExactScrollValue(int smallScroll)
        If the grid is scrolled less than for given amount of records, the exact positioning in cycle will be used instead of interpolation.
        Parameters:
        smallScroll - new value.

      • getMaxExactScrollValue

        public int getMaxExactScrollValue()
        If the grid is scrolled less than for returned number of records, the exact positioning in cycle will be used instead of interpolation.
